scripts.build:clean: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.quality: bun run type-check && bun run lint && bun run format:check
scripts.quality:fix: bun run type-check && bun run lint:fix && bun run format
scripts.ci:local: bun run quality && bun test && bun run build
scripts.docs:serve: bun run docs && cd docs/api && python3 -m http.server 8080
scripts.prerelease: bun run quality && bun test && bun run build
scripts.release:openapi:patch: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/openapi --version=$(cd packages/openapi && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:openapi:minor: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/openapi --version=$(cd packages/openapi && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:openapi:major: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/openapi --version=$(cd packages/openapi && npm version major --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:core:patch: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/core --version=$(cd packages/core && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:core:minor: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/core --version=$(cd packages/core && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:core:major: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/core --version=$(cd packages/core && npm version major --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:raml:patch: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/raml --version=$(cd packages/raml && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:raml:minor: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/raml --version=$(cd packages/raml && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:raml:major: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/raml --version=$(cd packages/raml && npm version major --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:cli:patch: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/cli --version=$(cd packages/cli && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:cli:minor: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/cli --version=$(cd packages/cli && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version)
scripts.release:cli:major: bun run scripts/release.ts --packages=@laag/cli --version=$(cd packages/cli && npm version major --no-git-tag-version)
